00025 class NetAdapter : public NonCloneable {
00026 
00027     public:
00029         typedef UINT Id;
00030 
00032         enum Type {
00033             c_type_udp,
00034             c_type_tcp
00035         };
00036 
00038         enum Event {
00039             c_event_data_sent,
00040             c_event_data_received,
00041             c_event_adapter_closed
00042         };
00043 
00045         struct DataSentEventArgs;
00046         struct DataReceivedEventArgs;
00047 
00048         struct EventArgs {
00049             virtual const DataSentEventArgs& GetDataSentEventArgs() const
00050             { ASSERT_ALWAYS(FALSE); return static_cast<const DataSentEventArgs&>(*this); };
00051             virtual const DataReceivedEventArgs& GetDataReceivedEventArgs() const
00052             { ASSERT_ALWAYS(FALSE); return static_cast<const DataReceivedEventArgs&>(*this); };
00053         };
00054 
00055         struct DataSentEventArgs : public EventArgs {
00056 
00057             virtual const DataSentEventArgs& GetDataSentEventArgs() const
00058             { return static_cast<const DataSentEventArgs&>(*this); }
00059 
00060             UINT32 m_data_len;
00061         };
00062 
00063         struct DataReceivedEventArgs : public EventArgs {
00064 
00065             virtual const DataReceivedEventArgs& GetDataReceivedEventArgs() const
00066             { return static_cast<const DataReceivedEventArgs&>(*this); }
00067 
00068             UINT32 m_data_len;
00069             UINT8* m_buffer;
00070             InetSocketAddr m_recv_from;
00071         };
00072 
00073     public:
00074         NetAdapter(
00075             NetAdapterHandler* handler,
00076             Id id,
00077             Type type);
00078 
00079         Id GetId() const {
00080             return m_id;
00081         }
00082 
00083         Type GetType() const {
00084             return m_type;
00085         }
00086 
00087     protected:
00088         NetAdapterHandler* m_handler;
00089         Id  m_id;
00090         Type m_type;
00091         // ToDo: Add this to all constructors.
00092         // BOOLEAN  m_is_server; 
00093 };

00097 class NetAdapterHandler : public NonCloneable {
00098 
00099     friend class NetAdapter;
00100     friend class ClientNetAdapter;
00101 
00102     public:
00103         typedef NiSharedPtr<NetAdapter> NetAdapterPtr;
00104 
00106         typedef void (*NetAdapterHandlerCallback)(void* client_arg,
00107             NetAdapterHandler &handler, NetAdapter &net_adapter,
00108             NetAdapter::Event event, const NetAdapter::EventArgs &event_args);
00109 
00111         NetAdapterHandler(NetAdapterHandlerCallback callback, void* client_arg, UINT32 recv_buffer_size = 512);
00112 
00114         ~NetAdapterHandler();
00115 
00116         NetAdapter::Id OpenClientNetAdapter(DataConnProfileId dc_id,
00117             NetAdapter::Type net_adapter_type,
00118             const IpAddr& remote_address, const IpPortNo& remote_port, IpPortNo* local_port = 0);
00119 
00120         NetAdapter::Id OpenServerNetAdapter(DataConnProfileId dc_id,
00121             NetAdapter::Type net_adapter_type,
00122             const IpPortNo& local_port);
00123 
00124         BOOLEAN Send(NetAdapter::Id id, const UINT8* buffer, UINT32 len, InetSocketAddr *to = 0)
00125             const;
00126 
00127         NetAdapterPtr GetNetAdapter(NetAdapter::Id id) const;
00128 
00129         // Closes the given NetAdapter.
00130         BOOLEAN CloseNetAdapter(NetAdapter::Id id);
00131 
00132         // Closes all NetAdapters.
00133         void CloseAllNetAdapters();
00134 
00136         static UINT GetInvalidNetAdapterId() { return static_cast<UINT>(-1); }
00137 
00138     protected:
00139 
00141         // Application overrides
00142 
00143         virtual void OnDataReceived(NetAdapter &netadapter, const NetAdapter::DataReceivedEventArgs& args)
00144             { InvokeCallBack(netadapter, NetAdapter::c_event_data_received, args); }
00145 
00146         virtual void OnDataSent(NetAdapter &netadapter, const NetAdapter::DataSentEventArgs& args)
00147             { InvokeCallBack(netadapter, NetAdapter::c_event_data_sent, args); }
00148 
00149         virtual void OnNetAdapterClosed(NetAdapter &netadapter)
00150             { InvokeCallBack(netadapter, NetAdapter::c_event_adapter_closed); }
00151 
00153 
00154     private:
00155         
00157         NetAdapterPtr CreateNetAdapter(NetAdapter::Type type);
00158 
00159         void InvokeCallBack(NetAdapter &net_adapter, NetAdapter::Event event,
00160             const NetAdapter::EventArgs &args = NetAdapter::EventArgs());
00161 
00162         NetAdapter::Id OpenNetAdapter(DataConnProfileId dc_id,
00163             NetAdapter::Type net_adapter_type, const IpAddr& remote_address,
00164             const IpPortNo& remote_port, IpPortNo* local_port, BOOLEAN is_server);
00165 
00166         BOOLEAN OpenNetAdapter(
00167             NetAdapterPtr net_adapter, DataConnProfileId dc_id,
00168             const IpAddr& remote_address, const IpPortNo& remote_port,
00169             IpPortNo* local_port, BOOLEAN is_server);
00170 
00172         void* m_client_arg;
00173 
00176         NetAdapterHandlerCallback m_callback;
00177 
00179         mutable Semaphore m_map_sem;
00180 
00182         typedef SimpleMap<NetAdapter::Id, NetAdapterPtr> NetAdapterMap;
00183         NetAdapterMap m_net_adapter_map;
00184 
00186         const UINT32 m_recv_buffer_size;
00187 };

00191 class ClientNetAdapter : public NetAdapter {
00192     typedef NetAdapter Base;
00193 
00194     public:
00195         ClientNetAdapter(
00196             NetAdapterHandler* handler,
00197             NetAdapter::Id id,
00198             NetAdapter::Type type);
00199 
00200         virtual ~ClientNetAdapter();
00201 
00202         virtual BOOLEAN Send(const UINT8* data, UINT32 len, InetSocketAddr *to = 0);
00203         void HandleOnAsyncEvent(InetSocket::Event event);
00204 
00205         virtual INT Read(void *buf, INT buflen, InetSocketAddr *from = 0) = 0;
00206         virtual INT Write(const void *buf, INT buflen, InetSocketAddr *to = 0) = 0;
00207         virtual INT GetInBufByteCount() = 0;
00208         virtual SocketError GetError() const = 0;
00209 
00210     protected:
00212         UINT8* m_recv_buffer;
00213 
00215         UINT8* m_send_buffer;
00216         UINT32 m_send_buffer_size;
00217         UINT32 m_send_buffer_offset;
00218         UINT32 m_data_sent;
00219 
00221         Semaphore m_send_sem;
00222 };

00226 class UdpNetAdapter : public UdpSocket, public ClientNetAdapter {
00227 
00228     typedef UdpSocket Base;
00229 
00230     public:
00231         UdpNetAdapter(
00232             NetAdapterHandler* handler,
00233             NetAdapter::Id id,
00234             NetAdapter::Type type);
00235 
00236         virtual INT Read(void *buf, INT buflen, InetSocketAddr *from = 0)
00237         { return Base::Read(buf, buflen, from); }
00238 
00239         virtual INT Write(const void *buf, INT buflen, InetSocketAddr *to = 0)
00240         { return Base::Write(buf, buflen, to);  }
00241 
00242         virtual INT GetInBufByteCount()
00243         { return Base::GetInBufByteCount(); }
00244 
00245         virtual SocketError GetError() const
00246         { return Base::GetError(); }
00247 
00248     protected:
00250         virtual void OnAsyncEvent(InetSocket::Event event)
00251         { ClientNetAdapter::HandleOnAsyncEvent(event); }
00252 };

00256 class TcpNetAdapter : public TcpSocket, public ClientNetAdapter {
00257 
00258     typedef TcpSocket Base;
00259 
00260     public:
00261         TcpNetAdapter(
00262             NetAdapterHandler* handler,
00263             NetAdapter::Id id,
00264             NetAdapter::Type type);
00265 
00266         virtual INT Read(void *buf, INT buflen, InetSocketAddr *from = 0)
00267         { return Base::Read(buf, buflen); }
00268 
00269         virtual INT Write(const void *buf, INT buflen, InetSocketAddr *to = 0)
00270         { return Base::Write(buf, buflen);  }
00271 
00272         virtual INT GetInBufByteCount()
00273         { return Base::GetInBufByteCount(); }
00274 
00275         virtual SocketError GetError() const
00276         { return Base::GetError(); }
00277 
00278     protected:
00280         virtual void OnAsyncEvent(InetSocket::Event event)
00281         { ClientNetAdapter::HandleOnAsyncEvent(event); }
00282 };
